notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

body.p: At a meeting held last week, the Chicago lodges of the Danish Brotherhood voted that the following members be known as the "Good Fellowship" of the Danish Brotherhood of America: L. A. Aggerbeck, Charles W. Anderson, Christian Baun, C. Brandholt, George Bring, C.M. Christensen, Jens Christensen, John P. Christensen, Robert Forup, Harry Frederiksen, A. Halvorsen, C. Hansen, Henry H. Hansen, John E. Hansen, Niels C. Hansen, Peter Hjort, Peter Jensen, Andrew S. Karkow, Arthur Christensen, Marious Krosh, Ove Kurr, Carl Larsen, M. Madsen, Carl Mitchel, Fred I. Nielsen, Theodor Nielsen, A. Olsen, John Schmidt, Peter Tandrup, and Ove Knudsen.
